GK16visa05cu:0: pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ atha keyamabhinavā vyañjanā nāma vṛttirityucyate---
GK16visa05cu:2: (vi, ka) vyaṅgyabhedāt kāvyabhedasya uktatvād vyaṅgyasya ca vyañjanāvṛttigamyatvād vyañjanāṃ pṛcchati---atha keyamiti /
GK16visa05cu:6: (lo, a) idānīṃ samanantaroktakāvyabhedadvayasya vyañjanāvyāpārasiddhyadhīnatvena tatra vipratipattiṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ prathamaṃ paricchedamārabhamāṇaḥ
GK16visa05cu:27: yatra ca svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra pratyuta doṣa eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:30: abhihitānvayavādibhiraṅgīkṛtā tātparyākhyā vṛttirapi saṃsargamātre parikṣīṇā na vyaṅghyabodhinī
GK16visa05cu:33: nanu rasādirabhidhayaiva bodhyatām ityata āhana ca saṃketita iti /
GK16visa05cu:34: nanu vibhāvādibhireva rasādibhāvādiḥ saṃketita eva ityatrāhana hīti /
GK16visa05cu:35: tadaikyarūpyaṃ tatsvarūpatā, vibhāvādirhi nāyakādiḥ, rasaśca tadvyakteratyādiḥ /
GK16visa05cu:39: nanu rasādirnābhidhayā bodhyatām, naiyāyikasvīkṛtayā tātparyākhyayā vṛttyā bodhyatāmityata āha---abhihitānvayeti /
GK16visa05cu:42: rasādirapi kathaṃ na saṃketita ityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16visa05cu:45: yadi rasādeḥ saṃketitatvamucyate tat kiṃ vibhāvādivācakena śabdena ?
GK16visa05cu:46: kiṃ svaśabdenā vā ? nādyaḥ, tasya vibhāvādibhirvyañjanīyatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:47: svaśabdābhidhāne ca na tasya pratītiḥ kintu doṣa eva /
GK16visa05cu:48: svaśabdo hi rasaśabdaḥ, śṛṅgārādiśabdo vā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:49: "śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi ! mūrtimāniva madhau mugdho hariḥ kīḍatī"tyādau ca vibhāvādisāmagrayādeva tadvyañjakatvam na tu śṛṅgārādiśabdasya /
GK16visa05cu:54: vyaṅgyabodhikā, yathā dhanurdharamuktena iṣuṇā pratisaṃhitamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ dīrgheṇa vegarūpavyāpāreṇa bhittvā apratisaṃhitaṃ lakṣyāntaramapi dīrgatarībhūtena tenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa bhidyata iti yat keṣāñcimatam,
GK16visa05cu:55: yacca tātparyavṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā iti dhvanikasya matam, dūṣayituṃ
GK16visa05cu:57: so 'yamityabhidhaiva vyaṅgyabodhiketi yat kaiściduktaṃ tatra so 'yamityabhidhānarūpeṣorvyāpāra ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:60: ayamarthaḥ--yathā khalu dhanuṣmatā mukto bāṇa ekenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa śatroḥ kavacādikamanekaṃ bhinatti, tathaika eva śabdasya
GK16visa05cu:68: vyañjanāyāstātparyātatiriktatvād asau naṃ dhvanirna vyañjanā, kintu tātparyamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:74: na tulayā dhṛtam; kvacinnirūddhaprasarīkṛtya vākyārthabodhanamātre vyavasthāpitam /
GK16visa05cu:75: tayorupari "śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ" iti vādibhireva pātanīyo daṇḍaḥ
GK16visa05cu:80: bodhanānupapattiḥ, kramaśo bodhe ca tatsattve viramya vyāpārabhāva
GK16visa05cu:82: idaṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ na ruciram; vyañjanāvādināpi kramaśo bodhāṅgīkāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:84: tātparyasattve vṛttibheda eva viramya vyāpāraḥ svīkriyate, na tu ekayā vṛttyā iti cenna
GK16visa05cu:87: tasmāt kramaśo bodhena tātparyagrāhakābhāva eva tayorupari doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:88: na ca phalameva tadgrāhakamiti vācyam; phalasya tātparyottarabhāvitvāt /
GK16visa05cu:89: kramaśo vyañjanayā bodhane tu vaktṛboddhavāyadivaiśiṣṭyameva tātparyagrāhakam /
GK16visa05cu:90: na caivaṃ tadgrāhitaṃ tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ dhvanikamate vṛttirastu, na vyañjaneti vācyam "ityatrātātparyaviṣayasya vyaṅgyaśṛṅgārasya aparāṅgam,
GK16visa05cu:91: yathā vā "surabhimāṃsaṃ bhuṅkṣva "iti sugandhimāṃsatātparyake vākye dhenumāṃsavyañjanā
GK16visa05cu:97: evaṃ ca kimiti lakṣaṇāpuyapāsyā ? dīrghadīrghatarābhidhāvyāpāreṇāpi tadarthabodhasiddheḥ /
GK16visa05cu:101: (lo, ṛ) evaṃ ca yadi śabdaśruteranantaraṃ yāvānartho 'vagamyate
GK16visa05cu:102: tāvati śabdasyābhidhā eva vāyapāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:105: kimiti ca "brāhmaṇa ! putraste jātaḥ, kanyā te garbhiṇī" ityādāvapi harṣaśokādīnāmapi na vācyatvam
GK16visa05cu:107: (vi, ja) nanu na aṅgīkāryaiva lakṣaṇā ityata āha---kimiti ceti /
GK16visa05cu:108: kanyeti---atra kanyā adattā; tasyā eva garbhe pituḥ śokāt /
GK16visa05cu:109: atra hi sambodhyavrāhmaṇasannihitāparajanasya tādṛśaśabdaśravaṇānantaraṃ vrāhmaṇasya harṣaśokāvagamāt tacchabdīyadīrghatarābhidhayaiva tadvodhasambhavena tayorvācyatāpattirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:112: ayamarthaḥ--harṣādayo hi na kenāpi vācyatvenābhyupagamyante, yato 'mī
GK16visa05cu:117: tataśca kāvyaśabdānāṃ niratiśayasukhāsvādavyatirekeṇa pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ pravṛttyaupayikaprayojanānupalabdherniratiśayamukhāsvāda eva kāryatvenāvadhāryate /
GK16visa05cu:118: "yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ" iti nyāyāt" iti /
GK16visa05cu:120: (vi, jha) yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ "iti jaiminivākyameva vyaṅgyabodhane tātparyākhyavṛttau pramāṇamiti mataṃ dūṣayitumutthāpayati---yatpunariti /
GK16visa05cu:125: tathā ca sukhāsvādakāraṇatā kāvyavākyasya vyaṅgyabodhadvāreṇaiva etadvākyasya vyaṅgyatātparyakatvāt
GK16visa05cu:128: kāvyaprakāśe tu asya vākyasya bhinna evārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:129: tathā hi--"yatparo yatsādhyatātparyakaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdasya
GK16visa05cu:130: prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'thaḥ na tu siddhaṃśe tasya śabdasya prāmāṇyam"iti /
GK16visa05cu:132: na tu siddhagavāṃśaḥ; yathā vā, "dadhnā juhoti"ityatra dadhnaḥ karaṇatvaṃ pādhyāṃśastu tathā; na tu vākyāntarataḥ siddhahomāṃśa iti /
GK16visa05cu:134: (lo, ḷ) samprati gurumataikadeśīyasya, "yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ
GK16visa05cu:141: pratipādyo yaṃ prati vākyaṃ śrāvyate; pratipādakastasya śrāvayitā /
GK16visa05cu:143: tasmānniratiśayasukhāsvādarūpo rasādirūpor'thaḥ śabdasya tātparyaviṣayo jātaḥ kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayeti
GK16visa05cu:144: yatpase yaduddeśyaprayuktaḥ; sa śabdārthaḥ śabdenāvaśyaṃ boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:145: tatra praṣṭavyam-kimidaṃ tatparatvaṃ nāma, tadarthatvaṃ vā, tātparyavṛttyā tadvodhakatvaṃ vā ? ādye na vivādaḥ, vyaṅgyatve 'pi tadarthatānapāyāt /
GK16visa05cu:151: sa śabdārtha ityasya vākyasya tatparatvamarthaḥ tadeva tatparatvaṃ
GK16visa05cu:156: tadanyā vā iti tātparyākhyā vṛttiḥ saṃsargaṃ bodhayitvā vyaṅgyārthamapi bodhayatīti dhvanikena yaduktaṃ tacca prāgeva dūṣitam /
GK16visa05cu:164: nanvastu yugapadeva tātparyaśaktyā vibhāvādisaṃsargasya rasādeśca prakāśanam-iti cet ? na, tayorhetuphalabhāvāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visa05cu:169: (vi, ṭa) nanu atiriktapadārtharūpā turīyā vūttirdhvanikena nocyate,
GK16visa05cu:175: rasaniṣpattirityatra rasasya jñānaniṣpattireva niṣpattiḥ svaprakāśasya svajñānābhinnatvāt
GK16visa05cu:184: anayaiva diśā pratīyamānayorvastvalaṅkārayorapi,"yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ"itinyāyāśrayeṇa vyañjanāṅgīkāro 'nupapanna eva /
GK16visa05cu:185: kiñca, "yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ"iti nyāyamaṅgīkurvatāṃ vyañjanānaṅgīkāre vānīrakuñja ityādau guṇībhūtaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ
GK16visa05cu:186: prathamamavataran śabdasya tatparatvābhāvāt kasya vyāpārasya viṣayatāmavalambatām ? nanu tarhi bhaṭṭanayavat, "pīno devadatto divā na
GK16visa05cu:188: '; ityādau, "rātrau bhuṅkte'; ityādivadatrāpi vyaṅgyārthapratītau vākyaśeṣaṃ kalpatāmiti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:190: "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau taṭādyarthamātrabodhaviratāyā lakṣaṇāyāśca kutaḥ śītatvapāvanatvādivyaṅgyabodhakatā
GK16visa05cu:193: (vi, ṭha) nanu lakṣaṇāmūlavyañjanā nādriyatām, ekayaiva lakṣaṇayā lakṣayavyaṅgyārthadvayaṃ bodhyatāmityata āha---gaṅgāyāmiti /
GK16visa05cu:203: (vi, ḍa) nanu abhidhā lakṣaṇā ca dīrghatarībhūtaiva vyaṅgyārthaṃ
GK16visa05cu:205: vyaṅgyabodhana iva svīkārya ityato vaidharmyādeva vācyavyaṅgyabodhakavyāpārayorbhedaṃ sādhayati
GK16visa05cu:207: kāryam, pratītiḥ, kālaḥ, āśrayaḥ, viṣayaścetyādīnāṃ ca bhedādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:209: bhinno 'bhidheyato vyaṅgya iti---yadyapi abhidhāvyañjanayoreva bhedaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ, tathāpi tadbhedapradarśanenaiva tadvodhakasyāpi bhedaḥ pradarśita ityāśayena itthamuktam /
GK16visa05cu:217: vācyārthasya vaiyākaraṇairvedyatayā, vyaṅgyārthasya ca sahṛdayairityevaṃ yathāsaṃkhyamanvayaḥ
GK16visa05cu:218: vaiyākaraṇa hi padasya padavācyārthasya jñānamātre nipuṇāḥ, na tu vyaṅgyārthajñāne /
GK16visa05cu:219: "bhama dhammia--" (242 pṛ.) ityādau kvacidvācye vidhirūpe niṣadharūpatayā,
GK16visa05cu:220: kvacit "niḥ śeṣacyutacandanam-" (62 pṛ.) ityādau niṣedharūpe vidhirūpatayā
GK16visa05cu:228: vidhirūpe vācye jñāte sati niṣedhirūpatayā vyaṅgyo jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:233: "gato 'stakarkaḥ" ityādau ca vācyor'tha eka eva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:239: vācyārthaḥ śabdoccāraṇamātreṇa vedyaḥ, eṣa tu tathāvidhapratibhānairmalyādineti nimittabhedaḥ
GK16visa05cu:254: "kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇapiāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16visa05cu:259: (vi, da) viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati---"kassa vā ṇa hoi'; iti /
GK16visa05cu:260: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam ?
GK16visa05cu:263: upanāyakadaṣṭādharāṃ patnīṃ tarjayantaṃ prati nāyikāsakhyāḥ pratāraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visa05cu:264: he vāritavāme ! vārite sabhramarapadmāghrāṇe vāme pratikūle ityāpātataḥ /
GK16visa05cu:269: nāyikayā hi pratīyate iyaṃ pratārayatītyevaṃ vyaṅgyārthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:272: (lo, i) kassa vā ṇeti---vāritādarthād vāme pratikūlakāriṇi /
GK16visa05cu:273: tatra vācyaṃ sakhīviṣayam, "bhramareṇa daṣṭadhareyaṃ, na punaḥ parakāmukena'; iti vyaṅgyaṃ tu kāntaviṣayam /
GK16visa05cu:275: kvacidapi nīlapītādau narapuṅgavādau bhedo na syādityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:278: śabdaikasamadhigamyatvābhāvād, iti cedatra kecidāhuḥ-yathā śabdabodhitasya kvacid vācyasyārthasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvamanumānaviṣaya iti
GK16visa05cu:280: vyaṅgyastu eva eva śabdapramāṇena prakaraṇādibodhya iti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti kayorvaiṣamyam /
GK16visa05cu:282: yathā prakaraṇāderviṣṇvādyanekābhidheyasyāpi haryādyabhidheyāvacchedakatvaṃ tathānekavyañjakasyāpi śabdasya ekavyaṅgye prakaraṇadisāhāyyasyeti kartavyatārūpatayā śabdasyāṅgatvaṃ svāṅgasya cāvyavadhāyakatvaṃ nyāyasiddhameviti na śabdapramāṇavyākopaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:283: iha ca yadyapi vākyārthasya pratītyanantaraṃ tasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇānumānenaiva
GK16visa05cu:284: tathāpi satyāsatyatvajijñāsātaḥ pūrvamupapannāyā vākyārthapramāyā apramābhāvāt śabdaikasamadhigamyatvācca na śabdaprāmāṇyavyākopaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:285: na hi cakṣurādinā pratītau satyāsatyatvapratyakṣaprāmāṇyaṃ vyākupyeta
GK16visa05cu:289: na khalu etāvataiva vyaṅgyānāmabhidhālakṣaṇābodhyatvaṃ nāsti, api tu itaradhāpītyarthaḥ
GK16visa05cu:294: (vi, dha) rasādibodhikā na lakṣaṇā nāpi abhidhā sambhavatītyāha--prāgasattvāditi /
GK16visa05cu:295: tatkāvyasthaśabdajanyo yo rasastasya śabdabodhānantarameva janyamānatvāt tatprāk tasyāsattvāt tatra tatkāvyasthaśabdasya śakterlakṣaṇāyā vā grahītumaśaktatvādityarthaḥ; prāgupasthite vastunyeva tayorgrahaṇasambhavāt /
GK16visa05cu:296: nanu kāvyāt prathamamanubhūyamāno yo rasastanniṣṭhasāmānyadharmarūpayā sāmānyalakṣaṇayā upasthite bhāvinyapi rase śaktigraho 'stviti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:297: śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā prāthamikarasabodhasyaiva tatsambhavāt prāk tasyānupasthitatvāt vibhāvādivācakaśabdānāṃtatra śaktigrahakatvābhāvāccetyapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:301: ataḥ śṛṅgārādiśabdābodhyatve rasatvānāpteḥ; kintu vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāraiva tatpratīterānubhāvikatvāt nanu iha kāvyasthāt
GK16visa05cu:302: śṛṅgārādiśabdājjñātasya rasasya prāgupasthitatvena vibhāvādivācakaśabdairlaṇayā rasāderbodho 'stu ityata āha---kiñca
GK16visa05cu:308: trayāṇāmapi vyaṅgyānāṃ mukhyārthabādhavirahādapi na lakṣaṇā bodhiketi
GK16visa05cu:312: kiṃñca, yatra"gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādāvupāttaśabdārthānāṃ bubhūṣannevānvayo 'nupapattyā bādhyate tatraiva hi lakṣaṇāyāḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:314: (vi, na) nanu rase 'pi tātparyasattvāllakṣaṇāṃ vinā tadanirvāha eva mukhyārthabādha ucyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GK16visa05cu:315: yadi rasādiśabdāttasya prāgupasthitistadaiva tasya lakṣaṇayā bodhārthamuktarūpamukhyārthabādhanirvacanaṃ saiva tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:316: rasanātmako vyañjanātmako vyāpāro yasya, etādṛśarasād bhinna eva
GK16visa05cu:336: yadi tu "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ'; ityādau padārthānāmanvayakāla eva
GK16visa05cu:337: bādhapratibhāsādyanvayasya vidhurībhāvastadā tena padārthena jalamayādinā ākṣipto yastaṭādistena saṅgatiranvaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:338: na punaḥ "śūnyaṃ vāsagṛham--" ityādau (22 pṛ.) mukhāyāthabādhaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:346: yadi ca "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau prayojanaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt, tīrasya mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāt /
GK16visa05cu:347: tasyāpi ca lakṣyatayā prayojanāntaraṃ tasyāpi prayojanāntaramityanavasthāpātaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:350: ghoṣaḥ'; ityādau yat śaityapāvanatvaṃ ca vyaṅgyamuktaṃ tīralakṣaṇānantaraṃ
GK16visa05cu:351: tatrāpi lakṣaṇaivāstu; kiṃ vyañjanayā ? ityāha---yadi ceti /
GK16visa05cu:353: mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāditi---ubhayameva tu nāstīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:357: (lo, ḷ) nanvevaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau māstu lakṣaṇā;
GK16visa05cu:360: śabdo hi prathamaṃ mukhyamarthaṃ pratipādya tasya vākyārthānvayānupapattau tatsambandhinamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa05cu:361: iha yadi tīrapratyayānantaraṃ bodhyaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣayati tadā gaṅgāśabdasya tīraṃ mukhyor'thaḥ syāt /
GK16visa05cu:370: na cāpi prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva tīre lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa05cu:372: nīlādisaṃvedanānantarameva hi jñātatāyā anuvyavasāyasya vā saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:374: (vi, bha) nanu lakṣyārthabodhānantaraṃ yadi prayojane lakṣaṇā tadaivānavasthā; śītapāvane tīre ghoṣa ityevaṃ prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva
GK16visa05cu:376: tatra gaṅgātīre ghoṣa ityato 'dhikārthasya pratītiḥ prayojanamiti kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ prayojanamanusandheyam /
GK16visa05cu:381: nanu tadanabhyupagame kiṃ bījam ? iti cet--lakṣaṇayā
GK16visa05cu:382: yatpāvanatvaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ janayitavyaṃ tatprayojanībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ ca tadeva paryavasitamityataḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāpattireva bījamiti sarvatra tu tayorbheda eva dṛśyate ityāha--nīlādīti nīlādijñānaṃ vyavasāyarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tatkāryaṃ tu jñātatā /
GK16visa05cu:383: naiyāyikānāṃ murāreśca mate 'nuvyavasāyaḥ tādṛśakāryakāraṇayośca kramotpattireva ityarthaḥ
GK16visa05cu:386: (lo, e) nanu yadi taṭādyarthabodhanāya lakṣaṇāvṛttirāśrayaṇīyā, iha caitadviśiṣṭameva taṭaṃ lakṣaṇā bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantareṇa ? tathā hi gaṅgātādātmyena taṭapratyayastāvallakṣyaḥ, gaṅgātādātmyapratītyā ca taṭasya daivasiddhameva śaityādiviśiṣṭatvamityāśaṅkyāha--na
GK16visa05cu:390: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visa05cu:394: rasādīnāṃ ratyādīnāṃ vyaṅgyānāṃ bodhanakṣamaṃ bodhakāraṇaṃ nānumānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:398: tasyānandasvarūpatvābhāvena anāsvādyatvāt; kintu śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyatvena vyañjanayā śābdabodhaviṣayo ratyādirbhāvukairbhāvyamānaḥ svaprakāśānandamayatvena pariṇata āsvādyamāno rasaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:401: tathā ca tādṛśarasasya hetūnāṃ ratyādikāryakāraṇasahakārirūpāṇāṃ vibhāvādānāmābhāsatvena nānumānaṃ nānumitirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:402: tathā hi vibhāvādayaḥ sītādayo hetavo mutubarthadidṛkṣādisambandhena rāmādivṛttayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:403: sādhyastūktarūpo rasaḥ kāvyaboddhaniṣṭha ityato hetūnāṃ viruddhatvamasiddhiśceti hetvābhāsatā
GK16visa05cu:405: rasādibuddhiḥ smṛtirūpāpi netyāha--smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ iti /
GK16visa05cu:408: vastutastu svaprakāśānandarūpatvenaiva na smṛtiḥ; tasyā evaṃbhāvābhāvāt /
GK16visa05cu:410: (lo, ai) evaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsya prācīnavedyatvaṃ nirasya mahimabhaṭṭena khalu rasavastvalaṅkāravyañjakānāṃ vākyānāmantarbhāvārthaṃ yadanumānaṃ darśitaṃ tattaddhetvābhāsadoṣeṇa vidhurīkṛtam /
GK16visa05cu:411: vyaktivivekakāreṇa hi--"yāpi vibhāvādibhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ sānumāna evāntarbhavitumarhati
GK16visa05cu:413: te hi ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāraṇakāryasahakāribhūtāstānanumāpayanta eva rasādīnniṣpādayanti
GK16visa05cu:414: ta eva pratīyamānā āsvādapadavī gatāḥ santo lasā ucyante, ityavaśyaṃbhāvī tatpratītikramaḥ kevalamāśubhāvitayāsau na lakṣyate, yato
GK16visa05cu:422: ta eva anumīyamānā ratyādaya eva punaḥ punaranuśīlanādāsvādyapadavīṃ gatāḥ santo jñānasambandhena sāmājikaniṣṭharasatāmāpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:423: tatpratītikrama iti---vibhāvādijñānam, tato ratyanumitiḥ, tataḥ punaḥ punaranuśīlanam, tata āsvāda ityevaṃ pratītikrama ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:426: kintu vibhāvādibhireva ratyādirvyajyata ityave bhramo jāyata
GK16visa05cu:436: ādye na vivādaḥ, kintu "rāmādigataragādijñānaṃ rasasaṃjñayā nocyate 'smābhiḥ" ityeva viśeṣaḥ
GK16visa05cu:440: ratyāderanumānaṃ vyañjanā ceti vivādo nāpātata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:441: tadaivātra vivādaḥ syād yadā rāmādigataratyādivyañjanaṃ mayā
GK16visa05cu:443: mayocyate rāmādigataratyādervyañjanam, tataśca vyaṅgyaratyādireva sāmājikaratyādāvabhedenā'pyamāṇo rasanākhyavyāpāreṇāsvādyamāno rasa iti
GK16visa05cu:445: sa eva dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tasyānumeyatvāsambhava ityāha---dvitīyastviti
GK16visa05cu:456: "yatra yatraivaṃvidhānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvasāttvikasañcāriṇāmabhidhānamabhinayo vā tatra tatra śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvaḥ" iti sugrahaiva vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca /
GK16visa05cu:458: (vi, va) vyaktivivekakāreṇa sambandhaviśeṣaṇavibhāvādīnāṃ yathoktānandarūpasavyāpyatā pakṣadharmatā ca sādhyate, dūṣayituṃ
GK16visa05cu:462: abhidhānaṃ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, abhidheyo nāṭyām, tadvyañjikā kriyā,
GK16visa05cu:466: (lo, au) atra mahimabhaṭṭadarśitāṃ vyāptiṃ dūṣayitvā vyāptigrahaṇābhāvaṃ draḍhayati--yaccetyādi
GK16visa05cu:475: arthāntarasya rasasyābhivyaktau āsvādane nibandhanakāraṇaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ yā sāmagrīṣṭā saiva vibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī no 'smākaṃ mate gamakatvena anumāpakatvena sammateryarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:478: arthāntarābhivyaktau yā sāmagrī kāraṇam iṣṭā saivāsmākamanumitau liṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:479: sāmagrībhāve 'pi hi vyaṅgyārthapratipattau yataḥ kutaścidapi yadeva tadeva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:481: tasya vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā ābhāsataiva syāditi bhavatāmapi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā vyaṅgyajñānaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:491: siṣādhayiṣitatvaṃ cātra icchāviṣayatvamātram, na tu anumitsitatvam,
GK16visa05cu:496: na, anumitsābhāvāt, na hi tasya niyamato 'numitsā bhavati, rasabodhastu niyamata eva /
GK16visa05cu:497: tathā jñātavibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī rasāboddhurjanasyāpyastīti vyabhicāraśceti bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:504: yacca "mama dhammia--" ityādau (242 pṛ.) pratīyamānaṃ vastu /
GK16visa05cu:509: (vi, sa) yatra vastuno 'laṅkārasya vā vyañjanā tatra vastvalaṅkārau anumānagamyau eveti naiyāyikamataṃ dūṣayitumutthāmapayati---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:515: jalakelau śrīkṛṣṇena svīyakaradattajalena rādhikāmukhacandraṃ punaḥ purabhiṣicya svīyakareṇa pidhīyate ca mucyate ca /
GK16visa05cu:517: pidhāne rātrau virahiṇastasya prātaḥ kālabhramāt saṃghaṭanam, mocane candrodayaviśiṣṭasandhyākālabhramād vighaṭanam /
GK16visa05cu:519: pidhānamocane kṛṣṇasyaiva kareṇa natu rādhikāyācha, tatkarasya jalakelitaralatve kṛṣṇamukhasyaiva sicyamānatvasambhavena svamukhasya pidhānāyogāt /
GK16visa05cu:520: yad vā--rādhikāreṇa pidhānamocanayorapi jalasekadvārā kṛṣṇakaraprayojyatvāttaddvārā kṛṣṭakareṇaiva pidhānamocane /
GK16visa05cu:522: atra śloke mukhe candrarūpaṇam ādipadadvayāt ślokāntare alaṅkārāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:531: rādhikāmukhasya candratvasya vyaṅgyatvāccandradarśanādarśanābhāyāṃ hi rātrisadbhāvābhāvabuddhyā cakavākayorvighanasaṃghaṭane bhavataḥ /
GK16visa05cu:540: pakṣe parvatādau sapakṣe mahānasādau ca vipakṣe jalahradādau vvāvṛttatvam /
GK16visa05cu:541: liṅgād vyāpyād dhūmādeḥ liṅgini vyāpake vahnyādau /
GK16visa05cu:546: (vi, ka) liṅgyasya trirūpatā ca sādhyavyāptisattve eva sambhavatīti /
GK16visa05cu:552: (lo, u) atra prakṛte, "bhrama dhārmika'; ityādau bodhyār'tho vyaṅgyo bodhako vācyaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:553: tataśca bodhakor'tho liṅgam, bodhyaśca liṅgī, bodhakasya cārthasya pakṣasattvaṃ nibaddhameva
GK16visa05cu:555: tasmādatra yadvācyārthālliṅgarūpālliṅgino vyaṅgyārthasyāvagamastadanumāna eva paryavasyati" iti /
GK16visa05cu:558: godāvarītīradeśe bhīruṇā dhārmikeṇa na bhramaṇīyam, tatra siṃhasattvādityanumānena bodhakārthaḥ siṃhasattvam /
GK16visa05cu:563: pakṣe godāvarītīranikuñjarūpe āśraye sāmarthyādavaseya iti na khalu sapakṣasattvavipakṣavyāvṛttatvābhāvaḥ
GK16visa05cu:565: tanna, tathā hyatra "bhama ammia-" ityādau (242 pṛdṛ) gṛhe śvanivṛttyā vihitaṃ bhramaṇaṃ godāvarītīre siṃhopalabdherabhramaṇamanumāpayati" iti yadvaktavyaṃ tatrānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visa05cu:575: kuto na yuktamityāha--tathā hīti atra--gṛhe iti /
GK16visa05cu:576: ayamarthaḥ--yasya khalu bhīrorgṛhe śvanivṛttyā bhramaṇaṃ vihitaṃ sa
GK16visa05cu:579: bhīrorapi guroḥ prabhorvā nideśena priyānurāgeṇa vā gamanasya saṃbhavāt,
GK16visa05cu:580: puścalyā vacanaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti saṃdigdhāsiddheśca /
GK16visa05cu:586: pakṣe godāvarītīre hetoḥ siṃhasattvasya sandehāt sāndigdhāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:591: kiñca ya khalu vīraḥ sparśādiśaṅkayā śuno bibheti sa saṃhasadbhāvasthānaṃ pratyuta mṛgayādikutūhalena gacchatīti darśanādviruddho bhramaṇarūpasādhyaviruddhasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa05cu:592: "jalakeli-" ityatra "ya ātmadarśanādarśanābhyāṃ cakravākavighaṭasaṃghaṭanakārī sa candra eva" ityanumitireveyamiti na vācyam, uttrāsakādāvanaikāntikatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:610: ābhāsamāna ābhāsau hetorupalabhyamāno vyabhicāraḥ kokatrāsakavṛttiḥ svadarśanādarśanarūpaḥ
GK16visa05cu:616: (lo, e) yogakṣema itikartavyatā ābhāsasya; yathā itikartavyatā kāryaniṣpādanaṃ tathaivevaṃvidhārthatvāditihetoriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:618: tathā "dṛṣṭi he prativeśini ! kṣaṇamihāpyasmadgṛhe-" ityādau (250 pṛdṛ)
GK16visa05cu:619: nalagranthīnāṃ tanūllikhanam, ekākitayā ca strotogamanam, tasyāḥ parakāmukopabhogasya liṅgino liṅgamityucyate; taccātraivābhihitena svakāntasnehenāpi saṃbhavatītyanaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visa05cu:626: granthakṛtastu stanāghātastrotogamanayoḥ pṛthakkathane 'pa na pṛthak hetudvayam /
GK16visa05cu:645: tatkāle sannihatajanastu yadi na vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tasyānumānamapi nāstītyatastatrāpi navivādaḥ
GK16visa05cu:646: yadi tu vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tṛtīyapakṣe evāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:650: tadviraheṇektasya candanacyavanāderupabhogavyāpyatā nāstīti tatraiva vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ
GK16visa05cu:652: (lo, o) na vivāda iti---na khalu vayaṃ dūtyāstatkalasannihitānāṃ
GK16visa05cu:654: tathāvidheti---na khalu, "niḥ śeṣacyutacandanam'; ityādipratipādikāyā abhiprāyaḥ kenacinniścitatayā viṣayīkṛtaityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:655: nanu vaktrādyavasthāsahakṛtatvena viśeṣyo heturiti na vācyam /
GK16visa05cu:671: kiñcaivaṃvidhānāṃ kāvyānāṃ kavipratibhāmātrajanmanāṃ prāmāṇyānāvaśyakatvena saṃdigdhāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ /
GK16visa05cu:682: tena ca tatkāntasyādhamatvaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti kathamanumānam /
GK16visa05cu:684: (vi, ḍa) nanu vyabhicāriṇa sandigdhena vā candanacyavanādinā kathamupabhogasya bhavanmate vyañjanāpītyata āha---vyaktivādinā ceti /
GK16visa05cu:687: na hyanumāna iva vyañjanāyāmapi vyabhicārādikamaṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:688: anumānapakṣe adhamasaninahitapreṣitatve satīti viśeṣaṇadānamapi na sambhavatītyāha---tena ceti /
GK16visa05cu:691: adhamatvasya prāmāṇikatvepi tasya dūtīgamanecchārāditye sati tāvatāpyanumānāsambhava ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:705: yathā "yo jīvati sa kutrāpyavatiṣṭhate, jīvati cātra goṣṭhyāmavidyamānaścaitraḥ" ityādi
GK16visa05cu:712: (lo, ī) yadi khalu pūrvaṃ jīvataḥ kutrāpi sthānamavagacchet /
GK16visa05cu:713: arthapattisvarūpaṃ hi--dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā anyathā nopapadyate iti,
GK16visa05cu:716: pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇairupalabdhaḥ śabdasya ca prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ bhedena nirdiśati--śruta iti /
GK16visa05cu:717: śruta iti śabdalakṣaṇena jñātor'thor'thaviśeṣo 'nyathā nopapadyata iti /
GK16visa05cu:718: śābdī hyākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva prapūryata iti darśanāt /
GK16visa05cu:719: "pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte'; ityatra rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaśeṣaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visa05cu:722: tato lokaprasiddhyopalabdhimātre vartate, na tu vikalpapratipādana
GK16visa05cu:724: śabdo hi kalpyater'thapratītyai viprakṛtasādhanaṃ tadvaram arthe eva kalpyatāmiti /
GK16visa05cu:731: pīno devadatta ityādau rātribhojane, jīvaṃścaitro 'tra goṣṭhyāṃ na vidyata ityatra kutrāpyavasthāne pūrvānubhavyāptimupajīvyaivārthāpatteḥ pravṛttiriti /
GK16visa05cu:735: kiñci---vastravikrayādau tarjanītolanena daśasaṃkhyādivatsūcanabuddhivedyo 'pyayaṃ na bhavati, sūcanabuddherapi saṅketādilaukikapramāṇasāpekṣatvenānumānaprakāratāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visa05cu:737: (vi, ta) sūcanā nāma kaścid vyāpāraḥ kaiściducyate tadgamya eva vyaṅgyārthaḥ iti mataṃ dūṣayitumāha---kiñceti
GK16visa05cu:742: tathā ca yadyaṅgulitolanādau vyabhicāraśaṅkā na bhavati tatrānumānam
GK16visa05cu:747: saṃketādilaukikapramāṇāsāpekṣatvenetyanena yatra yatrāṃ rdhvatarjanī tatra tatra daśaṃsakhyeti punargṛhītavyāptiruraskāravacanam /
GK16visa05cu:751: (vi, tha) rasādibuddheḥ smṛtirūpatvaṃ saṃskārajanyatvenānumanyamānānāṃ mataṃ duṣayitumāha---tatrāpīti
GK16visa05cu:752: idaṃ cāpātata eva; sarvaṃśe saṃskārajanyatvasya hetokhyabhicārāt /
GK16visa05cu:753: kintu svaprakāśānandasvarūpasya rasasya smṛtītvāsambhava eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:755: (lo, ū) smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ itikārikāpadārthaṃ viśadayati--yañceti
GK16visa05cu:758: "durgālaṅghita-" ityādau (59 pṛ.) ca dvitāyārtho nāstyeva---iti yaduktaṃ mahimabhaṭaṭena tadanubhavasiddhimapalapato gajanimīlikaiva /
GK16visa05cu:761: nāstyevetyarthaḥ apalapata ityasya, upari, iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:764: (lo, ṛ) gajanimīlikaiveti--paryālocanaṃ vināpi lokāpavādaśaṅkayā mattagajavaccakṣuṣī nimilya vacanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:765: tadevamanubhavasiddhasya tattadrasādilakṣaṇārthasyāśakyāpalāpatayā tattacchabdādyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā cānumānādipramāṇāvedyatayā cābhidhādivṛttitrayābodhyatayā ca turīyā vṛttirupāsyaiveti siddham Locanā:
GK16visa05cu:768: iyaṃ ca vyāptyādyanusandhānaṃ vināpi bhavatītyakhilaṃ nirmalam /
GK16visa05cu:770: (lo, ḷ) na ca śabdasamarpitasya vibhāvāderjñānasyaiva rasāderjanakatvāt kāvyamatra sākṣānna hetutvena vyāpriyata iti vācyam;
GK16visa05cu:771: svāṅgamavyavadhāyakamitinyāyena vibhāvād vibhāvanasyāvāntaravyāpārīkāraṇena kāvyasyaivāsvādo bhāvakatvāt yathā svārthasya jñānadvāreṇa tatsaṃsargaṃ bhāvayatāṃ padānāmeva karaṇatvābhāyupagamo bhaṭṭanaiyāyikādīnām /
GK16visa05cu:772: kiñca sadvārakaraṇam iti nyāyenāntarālavartivyāpārāntaravirahādasambhāvyaṃ vibhāvādisaṃvalanajñānasyāsvādaṃ prati kāraṇatvam /
GK16visa05cu:773: nanvevaṃ vyāptyādyanusandhānamantareṇākasmād vācyārthasyāvagatau kathaṃ nātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyāha--iyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa05cu:777: rasavyaktau punarvṛttiṃ rasanākhyāṃ pare viduḥ // VisSd_5.5 //
GK16visa05cu:785: smṛtyupanayasahakāreṇa bodhanaṃ tu vyaṅgyārthasya pūvānubhavābhāvena smaraṇāsambhāvanayaiva nirastam /
GK16visa05cu:786: nahyuktānandarūpo raso dūtyādeḥ kāmukasambhogādirūpor'tho vā pūrvamanubhūtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:794: iti sāhityadarpaṇalocane vyañjanāvyāpārasthāpano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visa05cu:795: iti sahityarpaṇo vyañjanāvyāpāranirūpaṇo nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
